documents.document: Can't shake a feeling of sadness & foreboding after reading news sources this morning, instinct is to stop caring, but I know that's wrong.
@billbennettnz it is just so sad, like watching a friend make a really bad decision they'll regret and not being able to stop them.
So used to Uber that I just tried to jump out a taxi without paying, oops.
@storminwalker @washingtonpost is that one of those dummies guides for being president do you think?
@stufox passed a dev exam, so next you'll be growing a beard, getting inked, and forgoing shoes in the office.
@stufox isn't that what the 4th of July was all about?
@orangegirlnz @pradajunky @sprudge how about all the runs you did for @storminwalker?
@orangegirlnz @businessinsider @Nissan so where does one get that awesome orange keyboard?
That's very precise conversion @orangegirlnz
@orangegirlnz wait, it was Rich's house?
About to see Rogue One with @jefweg who was outraged at my priorities given I hadn't seen it yet!
@billbennettnz luckily all rules of etiquette are waved 2-3 days either side of Christmas
@metlinkwgtn so public holiday evening hourly timetable isn't possible to connect from Kapiti train to main bus routes at Wellington station
About to brave Moore Wilson's on Christmas eve, wish me luck!
@billbennettnz seems like something Siri should really be able to do, but can't.
@Darmour_MSFT well it would be if you could ship it, yes. I'm eagerly awaiting it for opportunities right now.
What a great idea 👍🏻 https://t.co/C0NopbXfQV
@sariaumo @TietoCorp have a great Christmas party from your kiwi friends @Revera_NZ

Here's one for @orangegirlnz https://t.co/HRupH6cepR
Great to be back in Seattle, feels like my second home thanks to great friends here, especially after 5 days in crazy Las Vegas.
@orangegirlnz it was great to see you both, have a wonderful celebration dinner with @storminwalker
@benkepes @samcharrington interesting...
@benkepes @samcharrington this guy told me they only have 3 of them right https://t.co/zw8jVvn4AU

Having a terrible @FedEx customer experience, lost package, faulty automated call system disconnecting me, near impossible to speak to human
@tomwarren oops, someone probably tweeted from their work account I stead of their personal #thatsickningfeeling
@skyrize @storminwalker your mission @jefweg is to ensure you have changed their mind within 4 years, assuming the world is still intact
@MiniGuineaBakes oh, cool, you're here too! Looking forward to catching up some time this week.

@jefweg sounds terrible

@billbennettnz @business what a bizarre world we now live in where China is the voice of reason on climate change.
@NZStuff perhaps you shouldn't be listing the exact house addresses, as in this article, given looting problems? https://t.co/GLllBkZseL
@roddrury yeah, and you're so patient with the data migration as I recall. 😉
@FreemansbayScho @educationtimnz what an awesome opportunity for your school
@nytimes smart move, she's just looking to get out the country as she knows better than anyone what a mess he's about to make.

Awesome to see one of the planet's most inspiring tech leaders @satyanadella up close and personal in Aeotearoa New… https://t.co/czzbBPis4A
This is truly repulsive, can't believe what I'm reading while waiting to hear from a man I utterly respect, and who… https://t.co/C9tZZFr4vu
@nzregs pulling off one of the most ambitious on-stage demos I've seen anyone nail, no pre-canned video here! Big… https://t.co/4IxTOiy6xs
@stufox @nzherald there was once a time when religious organisations would rush to help disaster victims
@billbennettnz if he practiced the religion he claims to represent he'd be there digging & distributing food, not calling victims sinners
I can recommend not being in a crowded air bridge for a 4.8 aftershock #NZeq https://t.co/F67ICpOJC2
@billbennettnz @grantrobertson1 @clarecurranmp it has been absolutely essential during the earthquakes as a reliable source of information
@ChrisKeall @amyadamsMP ah, and on soon to be Trump airlines, I hear the flight attendants can be a little grabby.
@mdreid @harper one problem with social media is typically you only follow other people with a similar point of view.
@dwnz I'm expecting a plague of locusts next, we've done earthquakes, gales & now floods in 24 hours
@dwnz totally over it already!
@orangegirlnz @storminwalker that's great news, unexpected bonus to see you guys.
@orangegirlnz when are you there? I'm there the week starting 28th November, I suspect we might be going to the same event...
@buildmaster also, there is this summary of options, albeit a few months old now: https://t.co/mcgLDK2cFU
@buildmaster there is this, looks promising, but not yet released, so price unknown https://t.co/AGez7WeUQ7
@jaron_nz yeah, be interested to see if today's result impacts that.
@dwnz awesome, but can you speed up time?
Is there a 4 year count down clock website somewhere....
@casualjim how's that working out for you?
I keep thinking surely this must just be a bad nightmare and perhaps I'll wake up soon.
@storminwalker you might want to make a break for Canada now while you still can.
@billbennettnz the screen is awesome, after using it for a while it's hard to go back to anything else.
@buzzyNZ @buildmaster where does one go to appropriately view what could be the end of the world as we know it?
@KirstiGrant figured as much.
@KirstiGrant who's the boss?
@dwnz that's an awesome work space
@chewieroar but liking the Apollo rocket!
@cauld hey Chris, FYI you role description on Friday's Partner Connect agenda needs updated.
@billbennettnz some of my drivers have smelt like dogs, but I didn't realize they actually hired dogs
@vladsavov add the iPhone 7 in there and you'd need a couple more.
@jefweg sounds intriguing
@kirkj may I'm reading too much, but hard to imagine that slipped by them without them spotting it just a day after the NYC Surface keynote
@kirkj this is a company that announces key products at exactly the same time Jobs announced iPad, worries about the time showing in photos.
@tomwarren did you spot this image in the Apple keynote, interesting image for your Mac vs. PC article perhaps?

@vsphereblog yes, I am, catch up with you there 🙂
Had my piano black iPhone 7 Plus for 2 weeks and it's back is completely scratched up. My 2+ year old 6 Plus is almost scratchless.
